description: Rehabilitation of Jones Falls Locks (39-42) - Request for Proposal.
full_summary:
### Rideau Canal Jones Falls Locks Rehabilitation, Elgin, Ontario

#### Tender Information

- **Tender Title**: Rideau Canal Jones Falls Locks Rehabilitation, Elgin, Ontario
- **Reference Number**: WS4092269199-Doc4171536849
- **Amendment Number**: 7
- **Tender Date**: August 31, 2023
- **Closing Date**: October 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
- **Expected Contract End Date**: September 25, 2025

#### Project Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Parks Canada Agency (PCA), is seeking the services of a qualified General Contractor (GC) for the rehabilitation of Jones Falls Locks (39-42) at Elgin, Ontario.

#### Tender Details
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
- **Tender Category**: *Construction Maintenance Repair Services
- **Trade Agreements**: *World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

#### Contact Information

- **Contact Name**: Essa, Zobia (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Contact Email**: zobia.essa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Notice URL**: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17322713?extsite=MTczMjI3MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==> 

The RFP was issued and is available on the Ariba Discovery platform. Bids are due by October 10, 2023, at 14:00 EDT. The contract award will be based on lowest price. Note that the Closing Time was amended from previously posted timelines. Please do not submit your bids after
